## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                       | Type                                                                                                                                                                            | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`   | `color`   | Color variant                                     | `"almond" \| "blue" \| "cherry" \| "cyan" \| "error" \| "green" \| "grey" \| "indigo" \| "info" \| "orange" \| "pink" \| "red" \| "sage" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "yellow"` | `'sage'`    |
| `icon`    | `icon`    | Icon class (Font Awesome)                         | `string`                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
| `mode`    | `mode`    | Mode: number or icon                              | `"icon" \| "number"`                                                                                                                                                            | `'number'`  |
| `number`  | `number`  | Number to display                                 | `number`                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size of the badge                                 | `"lg" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                                                                                                                                                          | `'sm'`      |
| `variant` | `variant` | Variant: primary (filled) or secondary (bordered) | `"primary" \| "secondary"`                                                                                                                                                      | `'primary'` |
